author: James Joyce
text: My dear Mr Pound I received and returned, duly filled up, a form from the R.L.F. The secretary Mr Llewelyn Roberts, asks me to write to two friends requesting them to write to him at once in confirmation of my statement. Will you be one of these? I am sure you will be so kind. His address is: 40 Denison House, 296 Vauxhall Bridge Road, London, S.W. Sincerely yours James Joyce P.S. Mr Pinker will send I suppose my play to [you].
